subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous palace is associated with the royal family of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के राजधानी की फ़ोमेशकर का संबंधित क्या ऐसा मोटा जमीन है?
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort is the palace associated with the royal family of Rajasthan. It is located in Jodhpur and served as the residence of the Rathore Rajputs.

question_en: Which fort is associated with the Rajasthan rulers?
question_hi: की को राजी को राजी को
explanation_en: The Kumbhalgarh Fort is associated with the Ranas and Mewar rulers. It was built by Mahar Raja Jaisa Chand Palace.
